#summary ibus-pye user guide - Chinese version
= 拼音输入简介 =
本拼音输入法，是基于ibus平台，使用pye引擎开发的拼音输入法。 
= 输入法上手指南 =
== 怎样安装？ ==
=== 从SVN版安装 ===
{{{
$ svn checkout http://pye1.googlecode.com/svn/branches/ibus/ ibus-read-only

$ mkdir ibus-make

$ cd ibus-make

$ ../ibus-read-only/configure

$ make

$ sudo make install
}}}
=== 稳定版安装 ===
{{{
$ wget http://pye1.googlecode.com/files/ibus-pye-0.x.x.tar.bz2

$ tar jxvf ibus-pye-0.x.x.tar.bz2

$ cd ibus-pye-0.x.x

$ ./configure

$ make

$ sudo make install
}}}
